short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Make lectures on the web faster to watch

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
LectureLighter makes it easier to watch long lectures by speeding up the less important silent parts. For example, if the speaker is writing something down instead of talking, LectureLighter automatically fast-forwards through it, saving you time.

The LectureLighter extension makes it even easier to save time by integrating with Canvas, Zoom, and YuJa. Just click the LectureLighter icon where available and it'll automatically bring up a dedicated player for you to watch it in-- no video downloading required.

[Just want to test out the video trimming features, without installing anything? Visit https://cabalex.github.io/lecturelighter/ ]
